name: Bunny Hop (itch) (Gamehound Productions)
description:
Bunny Hop is a mobile puzzle platformer that puts your hopping skills to the test!

  • Puzzle platform
  • Challenging difficulty
  • 15 levels
  • 12 In game achievements
  • Tight and timing-based controls
  • Every move matters
  • 100% free: no ads, no in-app purchases.
